DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To find whether clinical MRI finding two year anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction associate MRI-based graft invisibility anteromedial ( AM ) graft would impact anteroposterior stability knee , MRI-based posterolateral ( PL ) graft invisibility rotational stability knee . Methods : 75 patient . One experience orthopaedic surgeon perform double-bundle ( DB ) ACL reconstruction . Two independent examiner make clinical examination two-year follow-up : clinical examination knee , KT-1000 , International Knee Documentation Committee ( IKDC ) Lysholm knee evaluation score IKDC functional score . The MRI evaluation make two musculoskeletal radiologist separately mean measurement use .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tunnel Placements Clinical MRI Findings Two Years After ACL Reconstruction With DB Technique
DOC.criteria: primary ACL reconstruction , close growth plate ligament injury opposite knee
